name: async
description: Higher-order functions and common patterns for asynchronous code

scripts.mocha-test: npm run mocha-node-test && npm run mocha-browser-test
scripts.test: npm run-script lint && npm run nodeunit-test && npm run mocha-test
scripts.lint: jshint lib/*.js test/*.js perf/*.js && jscs lib/*.js test/*.js perf/*.js
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
